lead_paragraph: The commander, Brig. Gen. Hussein Mansour, was killed Friday night by a sniper near Kirkuk during clashes between Islamic State fighters and Kurdish security forces, known also as pesh merga.

headline.main: Iraq: Militants Kill a Kurdish Commander Near Kirkuk
headline.print_headline: Iraq: Militants Kill a Kurdish Commander Near Kirkuk
